description: Try our easy to follow Pumpkin, Lentil, Rocket & Beef Salad recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Pumpkin, Lentil, Rocket & Beef Salad Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Place all the ingredients, except the tapenade, in a large bowl and toss gently to combine well. Divide among bowls or plates, then add a spoonful of tapenade and serve immediately.
